snippet: Less than a month after smoking was outlawed in 35,000 California bars and casinos, the state Assembly approved a bill late Wednesday that would lift the ban.    The ban has been the object of intense lobbying by bar and tavern owners, who say it ...
lead_paragraph: Less than a month after smoking was outlawed in 35,000 California bars and casinos, the state Assembly approved a bill late Wednesday that would lift the ban. The ban has been the object of intense lobbying by bar and tavern owners, who say it is driving away customers.
abstract: California Assembly approves bill that would lift ban on smoking in bars and casinos (S)

headline.main: California Rethinks Ban on Bar Smoking
